mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (user_id, board_title, board_content, board_category, board_public, board_thumbnail, board_img_original) VALUE (#{userId}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardCategory}, #{boardPublic}, #{boardThumbnail}, #{boardImgOriginal})
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.user_id, a.str_user_id, a.board_title, a.board_category , date_format(a.board_created_at, '%Y년 %m월 %d일') AS board_created_at , a.user_nickname, a.board_public, a.board_thumbnail, a.board_img_original , count(l.board_id) AS like_count FROM ( SELECT b.id , b.user_id , u.user_id AS str_user_id , b.board_title , b.board_category , b.board_created_at , u.user_nickname , b.board_public , b.board_thumbnail , b.board_img_original FROM board b LEFT JOIN user u ON b.user_id = u.id WHERE b.user_id = #{userId} AND b.board_state = 1 ) AS a LEFT JOIN `like` AS l ON a.id = l.board_id GROUP BY a.id, a.user_id, a.str_user_id, a.board_title, a.board_category , a.board_created_at, a.user_nickname, a.board_public , a.board_thumbnail, a.board_img_original ORDER BY board_created_at DESC

SELECT b.id , u.id AS uId , u.user_id , b.board_content , b.board_title , b.board_category , b.board_created_at , b.board_count , u.user_nickname , b.board_thumbnail , b.board_img_original , count(l.board_id) AS like_count FROM board b LEFT JOIN user u ON b.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN `like` l ON b.id = l.board_id WHERE b.id = #{id} GROUP BY b.id, uId, u.user_id, b.board_content, b.board_title, b.board_category, b.board_created_at , b.board_count, u.user_nickname, b.board_thumbnail, b.board_img_original
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET board_title = #{boardTitle}, board_content = #{boardContent}, board_category = #{boardCategory}, board_updated_at = now(), board_public = #{boardPublic}, board_thumbnail = #{boardThumbnail}, board_img_original = #{boardImgOriginal} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE board SET board_thumbnail = null, board_img_original = null WHERE id = #{id}
